## InjectedRemirrorProps interface

These are the props passed to the render function provided when setting up your editor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface InjectedRemirrorProps<GExtension extends AnyExtension = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [actions](./react.injectedremirrorprops.actions.md) | <code>ActionsFromExtensions&lt;GExtension&gt;</code> | A map of all actions made available by the configured extensions. |
|  [helpers](./react.injectedremirrorprops.helpers.md) | <code>HelpersFromExtensions&lt;GExtension&gt;</code> | A map of all helpers made available by the configured extensions. |
|  [manager](./react.injectedremirrorprops.manager.md) | <code>ExtensionManager&lt;GExtension&gt;</code> | An instance of the extension manager |
|  [state](./react.injectedremirrorprops.state.md) | <code>CompareStateParams&lt;SchemaFromExtensions&lt;GExtension&gt;&gt;</code> | The previous and next state |
|  [uid](./react.injectedremirrorprops.uid.md) | <code>string</code> | The unique id for the editor instance. |
|  [view](./react.injectedremirrorprops.view.md) | <code>EditorView&lt;SchemaFromExtensions&lt;GExtension&gt;&gt;</code> | The prosemirror view |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [clearContent(triggerOnChange)](./react.injectedremirrorprops.clearcontent.md) | Clears all editor content |
|  [getPositionerProps(options)](./react.injectedremirrorprops.getpositionerprops.md) | Attach these props to a component to inject it with position data. Typically this is used for creating menu components.<!-- -->A custom positioner can be passed in to update the method used to calculate the position. |
|  [getRootProps(options)](./react.injectedremirrorprops.getrootprops.md) | A function that returns props which should be spread on a react element and declare it the editor root. |
|  [setContent(content, triggerOnChange)](./react.injectedremirrorprops.setcontent.md) | Replace all editor content with the new content. |
